recipe.title: Oven-Roasted Vegetables with Garlic
ingredients: 6 parsnips, peeled, halved crosswise, then lengthwise
2 medium-size red onions, peeled, each cut into 8 wedges
1 large head garlic, separated into cloves, peeled
3 tablespoons chopped fresh rosemary or 1 tablespoon dried
3 tablespoons chopped fresh thyme or 1 tablespoon dried
instructions: Preheat oven to 400°F. Mix first 7 ingredients in large roasting pan. Drizzle with oil and butter and toss to coat. Roast vegetables until golden and tender, stirring occasionally, about 1 hour 20 minutes. Season with salt and pepper. Transfer vegetables to platter and serve.
